TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ApplicationServicesHostFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactory

summary.span: 提供一个工厂类，它在托管承载环境中创建身份验证服务、角色服务和配置文件服务的实例。

span.span: Provides a factory class that creates instances of the authentication service, role service, and profile service in managed hosting environments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此工厂类提供了创建、 和类的实例的方法。This factory class provides a way to create instances of the , , and classes. 若要使用此工厂类, 请创建一个 WCF 服务 (.svc) 文件, 并`ServiceHosting`在`@ ServiceHost`指令的属性中指定。To use this factory class, create a WCF Service (.svc) file and specify in the `ServiceHosting` attribute of the `@ ServiceHost` directive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 `@ ServiceHost`在 .svc 文件的指令中指定以配置身份验证服务。The following example shows how to specify in the `@ ServiceHost` directive of a .svc file to configure the authentication service. ```csharp <%@ ServiceHost Language="C#" Service="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService" Factory="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ApplicationServicesHostFactory" %> ``` ```vb <%@ ServiceHost Language="VB" Service="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService" Factory="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ApplicationServicesHostFactory" %> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost (Type serviceType, Uri[] baseAddresses);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost(class System.Type serviceType, class System.Uri[] baseAddresses) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateServiceHost (serviceType As Type, baseAddresses As Uri()) As ServiceHost
protected: override System::ServiceModel::ServiceHost ^ CreateServiceHost(Type ^ serviceType, cli::array <Uri ^> ^ baseAddresses);

param.name: serviceType
param.span: 要创建的服务主机的类型。

span.span: The type of service host to create.
An array of base addresses for the service.

summary.span: 为具有指定基址的服务类创建实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of the service class that has the specified base address or addresses.

returns.span: 具有指定的基址的服务类型的 实例。

span.span: A instance for the type of service that has the specified base address or addresses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 在服务激活过程中 Windows Communication Foundation 会自动调用此方法, 并且无需手动调用方法。Usually this method is called automatically by Windows Communication Foundation as part of service activation, and you do not have to call the method manually.
